title: Public and private value creation using artificial intelligence: An empirical study of AI voice robot users in Chinese public sector
research_description: This study examines how the effective use of AI voice robots in the public sector impacts both public and private value creation from the citizen's perspective. The study involves 492 users and focuses on trust and value creation in public services.
research_results: The findings indicate that effective use of AI voice robots positively affects perceived usefulness, perceived enjoyment, procedural justice, and trust in government, thereby enhancing public service value.
future_research: Future research could explore the long-term impacts of AI voice robots on public value and examine the differences in value perception among various demographic groups.
